trans: 正在同步 Steam 创意工坊文件...
疯狂小瑞瑞_LEORChn 内核汉化 v1.2.14

text: IF YOU CONTINUE YOU WILL OVERRIDE THE EXISTING SAVE GAME, ARE YOU SURE?
THE LATEST UPDATE INCLUDED SIGNIFICANT BALANCING CHANGES. WE RECOMMEND YOU RESTART WITH A NEW GAME.\n\nCONTINUE ANYWAY?
trans: 游戏已更新，但存档版本较旧。虽然还是可以玩，但是比较建议开新存档，这样可以享受更平衡的数值。\n\n要继续游戏吗？

text: THIS SAVE GAME WAS CREATED USING MODIFICATIONS WHICH HAVE BEEN DEACTIVATED OR ARE NOT INSTALLED ANYMORE. CONTINUING THE GAME WITHOUT THEM MIGHT CAUSE TECHNICAL ISSUES AND IS NOT RECOMMENDED.\n\nCONTINUE ANYWAY?
trans: 这个存档所用的 MOD 尚未安装或启用，继续游戏可能会出现 BUG。\n\n要继续游戏吗？

text: FAILED TO CONNECT TO STEAM! YOUR PROGRESS (STATS, ACHIEVEMENTS, CLOUD SAVES) WON'T BE PERSISTED!
trans: 无法连接 Steam！统计数据、成就、存档云存储功能将无法使用和保存！

text: SOME SETTINGS HAVE BEEN MODIFIED. DO YOU WANT TO APPLY YOUR CHANGES?
trans: 有些设置发生了更改，要确认更改吗？

text: THIS GAME IS OPTIMIZED FOR RESOLUTIONS OF 1280 X 720 TO 1440 X 900.\nUSING HIGHER RESOLUTIONS MAY AFFECT YOUR GAMING EXPERIENCE.
trans: 本游戏已着重优化 1280x720 至 1440x900 之间的分辨率。\n使用更高的分辨率可能会影响你的游戏体验。
选择上一个角色或目标
选择下一个角色或目标
开关商店界面（基地可用）
取消操作、打开游戏菜单

text: YOU'VE CHANGED THE STATUS OF SOME MODS. THIS REQUIRES A RELOAD. THE GAME WILL NOW RESTART.
trans: 你更改了一些 MOD，需要重启游戏才能生效。

text: CLICK ON THE MAP TO SELECT YOUR MISSION
DO YOU WANT TO LEAVE THE AREA?\n\n(YOU CAN KEEP EXPLORING BY CLICKING NO)
trans: 要结束探索了吗？\n\n（你可以点“否”继续探索地图中未领取的物品）

text: DO YOU WANT TO BEGIN MISSION BRIEFING FOR THE NEXT MISSION?
trans: 要开始执行下一个任务了吗？

text: HEALTH DETERMINES HOW MUCH DAMAGE THE CHARACTER CAN TAKE BEFORE BEING KNOCKED OUT.
trans: 体力值决定角色被击倒前可承受的伤害量。

text: AGILITY DETERMINES HOW FAR A UNIT CAN WALK. IT ALSO INCREASES HIT-CHANCE REDUCTION WHEN IN COVER.
trans: 敏捷值可以决定一个行动点能走多远。还可以在有掩体防护时降低被命中率。

text: AIMING DETEMINES HOW ACCURATE A UNIT CAN AIM IT ALSO UMPROVES CRITICAL HIT-CHANCE.
STIMPACKS, WHICH IS MORE THEN THE RECOMMENDED HUMAN DOSAGE. \n\n APPLYING MORE STIMPACKS CAN LEAD TO RANDOM AND NEGATIVE EFFECTS.
trans: 针兴奋剂，已经超过了推荐剂量。\n如果坚持要使用，可能导致随机或负面影响。
